content: DROP ALERTNFT SALEI am a beginner NFT artist, digital artist, and creator of the innovative Hephaestus project. As a lover of classical art, I would like to introduce my unique pieces of paintings that are sold on exchange.artMy first collection called Emotionless contains 26 pieces inspired by classical art styles from different historical eras. The collection features surrealistic paintings done in rough shape and describes the original style of execution and overtone, the form of which is empty and formless. The main goal of my creations is to cause an impact on the senses of the viewerIn part, the collection reflects fragments of the artist's life, namely me. As mentioned before collection covers the part of my life when I was struggling with depression and bipolar disorder. Dark and gloomy pieces represent the worse moments of my life and colorful and bright ones cover the moments when my soul was feeling relief.By purchasing my works you are contributing to the development of a future project and supporting a young artist. On my Twitter, you can find more information about the future project https://twitter.com/betaras_nft/status/1554019198363488256MY LOGO: https://imgur.com/EKXk7RyMy works: https://imgur.com/lOvSilYI recommend you check out the link and choose your own unique artwork that will become a gem of your collection.There are no taboos, human imagination makes it possible to reproduce all kinds of subjects with no boundaries.Collection link: https://exchange.art/series/Emotionless/nfts
